CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger;Stanislav Shevchuk
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the town of GPE , GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of GPE ( “ the ORG ” ) fined the applicant LAW for having exercised commercial activity without a licence and ordered the confiscation of QUANTITY of the waste metal collected by him .

CARDINAL . On DATE the same court , following the protest of the Chrornomorsk District Prosecutor of GPE , quashed this decision and terminated the administrative proceedings against the applicant . The case file was transferred to ORG of GPE for a decision on account of the applicant ’s criminal liability for tax evasion .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Head of ORG refused to institute criminal proceedings against the applicant .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG examined the same case file again and fined the applicant UAH CARDINAL for having exercised commercial activity without a licence and ordered the confiscation of QUANTITY of the waste metal collected by him . The applicant lodged an appeal with ORG of GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG , noting that proceedings were pending before ORG of GPE , ordered the suspension of the enforcement proceedings in respect of the decision of DATE . However , ORG sold the waste metal .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of GPE quashed the decision of DATE and terminated the proceedings on the ground that the same facts had already been examined by the court .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered the restitution of the QUANTITY of the waste metal to the applicant .

CARDINAL . On DATE the same court , following the applicant ’s request , modified the ruling of DATE and ordered ORG to pay the applicant UAH CARDINAL,CARDINAL in compensation for the waste metal sold by ORG .
CARDINAL . The applicant challenged the Bailiff ’s inactivity in enforcing the ruling of DATE on numerous occasions before the domestic authorities .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant lodged his claim for compensation for damage caused by the administrative proceedings against him and the confiscation of his property with ORG . On DATE ORG ordered ORG to pay the applicant ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of the LOC modified this decision and ordered the same amount to be paid to the applicant from ORG .
CARDINAL . The ruling of DATE , as amended by the ruling of CARDINAL DATE , and the judgment of DATE were enforced in DATE .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgments of ORG v. GPE , no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE , and PERSON v. GPE , no . GPE , § § CARDINAL , DATE .
